text: What does it mean if my parents trigger my suicidal thoughts I ve been in therapy for about a year and they used to be my safe persons to call when I was struggling  then six months later I removed my dad  and now I m considering removing my mom from that list and just sticking with friends and other family I really trust And I m so grateful that I ve been learning to manage my depression  but as of recent my relationship with my parents is getting rocky and it s starting to bring up a lot of old behaviors that I remember them showing when I was a kid   They didn t give me a sense of privacy and would look through my diary and outed me when I was a teen and did not want to come out yet  And they get angry over little things  Last night my little brother was having trouble falling asleep and he was stressed and crying so I put him on my top bunk to calm down and my mom found him and put full blame on me for ruining a months worth of progress They don t believe anything I tell them anymore and they make really hurtful comments about how they view my character and my body and that s what triggers it the most  I haven t had any thoughts of suicide for months  until twice this week I haven t even wanted to talk about stuff like this with my therapist because I m scared that they ll somehow find out and call me crazy and tell me that I m making these stories up  I m still debating if any of this was ever real or just a figment of overactive imagination  you know It hurts my heart bc i have to force myself to remember that I m not them and that I m not as worthless as they make me feel
summary: My relationship with my parents is getting rocky. They don't believe anything I tell them anymore and they make hurtful comments about how they view my character and my body. I haven't had any thoughts of suicide for months until twice this week.

text: Rock bottom againI spend a great deal of time pretending and faking myself  I have attempted numerous times to make friends  and stay sane My entire time in school I have been a loner  but not a loner by choice  For some reason I find myself on the outside of every person or group I encounter I got a job outside of school and thought that would help  I have co workers my age the only problem is that these people can drive  they are independent  My parents never went through with helping me get a license so I can t drive  These co workers are light years ahead of me with social skills I also can t seem to ever do a good job and often times people tell me how I am not doing enough and i will be soon fired  even in school no one in my film class nor computer class says I do a good job  I often miss questions I should have known  and I am generally made fun of because I make a mistake One of my goals was to become an author and after I self published my first book I didn t get any interest despite fake people telling me it was good  I wanted to give up but then I got into computer programming I like to think I am good at programming however when i talk to others who actually have the skill set they say I am not the type  People who know nothing about computers say I am awesome though I am going to be   in may and I don t have necessary skills to survive in this world For me suicide isn t going to be drastic  I will only do it once I know all my options have run out  Since I have attempted three times in my life already I fear a fourth will come up soon  I am not even sure why I am posting this  I don t know what I want  Most of the time I don t even know why I am upset
summary: Suicide is not an option for me as I don't have the necessary skills to survive in this world. I have tried to kill myself three times in my life already and I fear a fourth time will come up soon. I am not sure why I am posting this.
